doc_context:
path /v3/trade
opid storetrade
params None
sum store buy / sell trade
reqBody
oneof
type object
required
type
price
amount
pair
currency1accountid
currency2accountid
props
type
type string
desc type of the regular trade buy sell
enum
buy
sell
price
type string
desc price to buy / sell
maxlength 38
pattern ddd
amount
type string
desc amount of the trade to be bought / sold
maxlength 38
pattern ddd
pair
type string
desc trading pair
minlength 3
maxlength 30
pattern aazz09/azaz09
currency1accountid
type string
desc id of the account of the currency 1 trade currency
minlength 24
maxlength 24
currency2accountid
type string
desc id of the account of the currency 2 trade currency
minlength 24
maxlength 24
feeaccountid
type string
desc id of the account where fee will be paid if any if trade is a buy or futurebuy type feeaccountid must have same currency as a currency of currency2accountid and vice versa if trade is a sell or futuresell type feeaccountid must have same currency as a currency of currency1accountid
minlength 24
maxlength 24
fee
type number
desc percentage of the trade amount to be paid as a fee
minimum 0
maximum 100

desc additional attributes for the future type
required
sealdate

sealdate
type number
desc time in utc when the future will be filled
minimum 0
percentblock
desc percentage of the future amount which selling or buying account must have available on future creation this amount will be blocked till future is filled or expires
minimum 0
maximum 100
percentpenalty
desc if one of the parties dont have filled full amount of the future at the time of expiration the party will be penalized penalty is sent to opposite party in exchanged crypto
minimum 0
maximum 100
schName createfuturetrade
path /v3/trade/chart
opid chartrequest
params None
sum obtain chart data from historical closed trades
reqBody
schema chartrequest
type object
required
pair
from
to
timeframe
props
pair
type string
desc trading pair
minlength 3
maxlength 30
pattern aazz09/azaz09
from
type number
minimum 0
desc start interval in utc millis
to
type number
minimum 0
desc end interval in utc millis
timeframe
type string
desc time frame of the chart
enum
min1
min3
min5
min15
min30
hour1
hour4
hour12
day
week
month
year
path /v3/trade/history
opid gethistoricaltradesbody
params None
sum list all historical trades
reqBody
schema listoderbookhistorybody
type object
required
pagesize
props
id
desc account id if present only closed trades for given account will be present
type string
customerid
desc customer id if present only closed trades for given customer will be present
type string
pagesize
desc max number of items per page is 50
type number
maximum 50
minimum 1
offset
desc offset to obtain next page of the data
type number
pair
desc trade pair if present list historical trades for that pair
type string
minlength 3
maxlength 30
pattern aazz09/azaz09
count
desc get the total trade pair count based on the filter either count or pagesize is accepted
type boolean
types
desc trade types
type array
items

enum

futuresell
buy
sell

desc amount of the trade and is used between filter options
